name: Sarah's Pizza Adventure
description:
Short shitpost game made in 2 hours for the /vrpg/ pizza jam. You could probably clear it in 5 minutes.
Featuring Sarah Zabiarov from Zeta Gundam as the protagonist. Technically a Gundam fangame, but it has no cool robots in it. But it does have PIZZA. Don't sue me, Bandai!

CREDITS:
TAM Music Factory - G2-MIDI
